fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
* Every night send someone into a scenario with 4 possible choices
* These will have to be created by the host however they want, 3 of those choices will lead to their eventual death sometime this game

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: * If someone tries to convert you, rewrite the story. You will be notified, delay the conversion by 1 phase, if you correctly guess who the converter is, you will become the converter's role while killing the original one and destroying their role, unable to be interacted anymore. The role you will get will be equal to a fresh copy. Otherwise you die and will be unable to win the game.
